text: Creed Bratton (born William Charles Schneider; February 8, 1943) is an American actor and musician. He is a former member of the band The Grass Roots. He is best known for playing a fictional version of himself on the U.S. television series The Office. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:American folk singers Category:American rock guitarists Category:Comedians from California Category:Pseudonyms Category:Singer- songwriters from California
title: Creed Bratton
